snippet: After coming in fifth in the Iowa caucuses, Gov. Rick Perry dusted himself off and is running hard again. And he may not be all that misguided.
lead_paragraph: After coming in fifth in the Iowa caucuses, Gov. Rick Perry dusted himself off and is running hard again. And he may not be all that misguided.

headline.seo: Rick Perry’s Iowa Loss Hasn’t Slowed Him Down for South Carolina
headline.main: Perry’s Political Obituary Has Not Yet Been Written
headline.print_headline: Perry’s Political Obituary Has Not Yet Been Written
